prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a flat body and sharp fins.
I want a quirky Pokemon that resembles a fish but has unique patterns.
Generate a Pokemon that thrives in muddy environments and has an earthy color palette.
Make a Pokemon that appears to be both fish and amphibian, with distinctive markings.
Imagine a ground-type Pokemon that can camouflage with its surroundings very well.
Design a Pokemon that looks like a blend of a fish and a flat creature, with vibrant colors.
Show me a Pokemon that lives in wetlands and has a quirky personality.
